Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/83rd
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 76th, Loomis, 83rd and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/83rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.
